website_summaries.verdict: In spite of a few reported issues, it's a well-made level that has earned many more compliments than complaints, and is a good pick for those who need a smaller model.
pros: Though small, it's very handy and fits nicely in tool bags
Sturdy, thanks to the frame that's made of aircraft aluminum
cons: Bubble vials have been known to loosen and wobble, and are somewhat difficult to read in dim lighting
Some reports of magnets coming loose/falling off the level

customer_reviews.title: Quality but has its down falls .
customer_reviews.text: It's a quality tool. Magnets are strong. but has its cons. I don't like how the lines are a light blue makes it hard to see them unless there's good lighting . Also the way the magnets are positioned with one directly in the center makes it kind of hard to use if your trying to use it on the end of a pipe . Because you can't center it the magnet being centered pulls it to the side .
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: A very functional piece of art
customer_reviews.text: I am a female electrician and found problems with people "borrowing" my tools. When my tools looked like everybody else's, they would walk. This level is a lot heavier than Klien or Milwaukee. The bubble is about 1/4 of an inch within the lines. The magnets are STRONG; the level will stay put on the edge of a 1/2 of an inch Ridgid pipe while jostling a pipe around on a bender. The best part is the level has a beautiful silver finish and blue spirit (Liquid) that makes this tool absolutely unique!!!
customer_reviews.author: RoseWood

customer_reviews.title: Good level
customer_reviews.text: As a plumber, I use a torpedo level daily. Have used lots of different brands. This is one of the best levels I've used. Easy to read vials, magnet is strong, frame is very good quality
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Used item marked as new
customer_reviews.text: I get this in the mail today and it is completely used, beat up scuffed up you can see that it has been dropped(not good for a level) it has sharpie makes all over it I would give it 0 stars but it won’t let me
customer_reviews.author: Annamarie wallace

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Best torpedo level I've ever had, especially when considering the cost. First time getting one with blue sight glass, I actually really like it. The body of this thing is all metal and it feels quality. The magnets are nice and strong and it works as it should. It's a good tool and couldn't be happier with it. Exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Liroku

customer_reviews.title: Other torpedo's can't compair
customer_reviews.text: Almost lost my level to a tank farm drainage channel today. Had for 2+ years. Was prepared to purchase another today here on Amazon. But I fished it outa the drink. Still very accurate, best I've every had used in 30+ years as a skilled JW.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Heim

customer_reviews.title: A level that stands above most
customer_reviews.text: I really like this level. With the exception of using a precision machinist's level, this is probably the nicest one I've ever used. It's made from solid aluminum and has a great fit and finish overall. It's one of those tools that just feels nice to hold and to use. As far as functionality, it can measure at 0, 45, and 90 degrees. It has several magnets lightly countersunk into the base so they don't interfere with the accuracy of the level.
customer_reviews.author: N. A. DiBartolomeo

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby
customer_reviews.text: This level is not as good as the old check points but since their fall from grace this empire level is my new favorite at half the price. The bubbles are difficult to read in low light, it should have a fourth earth magnate and I miss the large central cut out for your hand on the check point. This level shipped to me square and level with bubbles that do not separate. Groovy
customer_reviews.author: Glen Appell

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made as it looks and feels high quality. I thought I would never use the built in magnet but the very first project I used it for was installing a metal gate and sure enough the magnet held the level on top while I adjusted the gate to level. Very happy with this item!
customer_reviews.author: N. Dralle

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for work. I took it out of the package at home and I stuck it to the fridge to check how strong the magnets were. I found them to be nice and strong. I stepped back and looked at it and thought wow, that's really nice looking. So, this one is staying on the fridge and I just bought another one for work. :)
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Nice, reliable
customer_reviews.text: They give us levels at work to use but I always like having my own. This is a very nice and easy to read level. It's made well and the magnets are strong. If you use a level daily like I do you will like this one but so will everyone else ;(
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and well made
customer_reviews.text: A great little torpedo level. Nicely made, multiple features, handles well, and accurate. I checked it against my Stabila and this level was dead on. Looks like it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Max Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: I really love this little level
customer_reviews.text: I do carpentry for a living and require various sized levels. I really love this little level! I'm someone that not only wants the best but I want it to look good too. This level not only is very accurate, functional, durable, and well priced, but is also very attractive in appearance! I love the magnet feature as well! I have it magnetized to the top of the inside of my trailer so I don't have to go looking for it when I need it. I highly recommend this level
customer_reviews.author: Kody Norton

customer_reviews.title: stylish
customer_reviews.text: I got it because it pretty, honestly. Sticks to conduit and strut well. Wish it had a 30 degree for bending offsets but i am happy with it so far. Used daily for 3 weeks
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: On point
customer_reviews.text: Best and handiest level in my tool bag. This little fella is dead on and well worth the price. I’ve had people pick it up and been impressed just by the weight of it!
customer_reviews.author: MSP2

customer_reviews.title: Love Empire products!!!
customer_reviews.text: A little expensive but worth it because they are durable and last a long time. Strong magnets. Took it to work the first day I opened it and accidentally fell down a core hole. Gone.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Nazarian

customer_reviews.title: Great craftsmanship and durability
customer_reviews.text: This level has some good heft to it. It's made from solid metal that has been machined out. I love this level! As a professional installer it sure looks like a professional tool.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah

customer_reviews.title: The best little level out there!
customer_reviews.text: I use this every single day at work. The strong magnets really HOLD to steel! Not the wimpy magnetic strips like on other levels. Really rugged solid metal casing too! Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Jones

customer_reviews.title: Seems well made except for the magnets that fell out during shipping.
customer_reviews.text: The magnets were glued so poorly that they had come out during shipping. All three of them. After months of procrastination, I finally cleaned the old glue off, properly prepped the aluminum level and magnets and glued them back in. For a level at this price, I expect a little more. The bubbles work and it looks well made.
customer_reviews.author: jeff schroerlucke

customer_reviews.title: It's a level that won't break.
customer_reviews.text: The toughest level I've ever owned. It indeed is "level". I tested this with another level. Also handy as a paperweight if you're not busy working on something.
customer_reviews.author: Arka

customer_reviews.title: better than the swanson savage
customer_reviews.text: Magnets aren't too far recessed so they don't fill up with metal shavings like my other levels. This one has replaced my savages for most day to day use. Excellent quality level
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Great level
customer_reviews.text: Great level for the price very strong magnets work great but got to get another one cause someone stole mine at work the first week great level but keep it in your eye sight highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: melvin wade moore

customer_reviews.title: Great level at a great price
customer_reviews.text: For just under 20$, this is a great level. Solid aluminum frame and rare earth magnets, with very strong holing power.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: A must have level
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to level. It is beautifuly made. Magnets work great. Tested the quality of the level with 3 others I have and it’s on point. Solid construction. I feel this will be by my side for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality unit
customer_reviews.text: The quality is fantastic, i like the magnet base to hold it in place. One drawback can be the blue liquid can sometime make it difficult to see the level clearly. I would recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: dyurkosr

customer_reviews.title: Built right. Built tough.
customer_reviews.text: As a plumber I make my living installing sewer lines. My readings have to be correct. This level is sturdy/well built and has never let me down. Unlike plastic levels this is solid steel. Ive never had to redo a lateral scense using this.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Judd

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnets!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a commercial steel stud framer. And I use this daily. It's a great torpedo and the magnets are strong. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby G

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Very study with to view for eat of reading on snap spaces
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Readable
customer_reviews.text: Billet frame with easy to read vials. Magnets do their job.
customer_reviews.author: Steven S. Weston

customer_reviews.title: Great pocket level
customer_reviews.text: A great small level for easy transport in a safety vest pocket. I was attached to the metal frame and magnets to ensure longevity at the job site.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel N. Peters

customer_reviews.title: The perfect level
customer_reviews.text: I’m a plumber, and HVAC service tech., this is the best level I’ve had in my 30 years (and counting) it’s sleek, solid, and really good looking! Makes a great fit in my tool bag!
customer_reviews.author: Brian W

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Product
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a very good product. It holds up against the other top brands. I am an electrician by trade, and it sticks to everything solid. And it’s slim profile makes it fit good in a tool pouch. Definitely will buy another one when I lose this one.
customer_reviews.author: Branded Tool Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Has a certain heft to it. Probably from the magnets, which come in very handy.
customer_reviews.author: C. Severin

customer_reviews.title: Nice level
customer_reviews.text: Great, solid and heavy. Nice magnets. Good quality and accurate. Could last many many years.
customer_reviews.author: loktai

customer_reviews.title: awesome level very durable
customer_reviews.text: awesome level, had it fall off a skylift 3 times, all 3 at 45ft and above, still works great. the metal held up. really atrong magnets
customer_reviews.author: Alexander MacNiven

customer_reviews.title: Magnets fell out after 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: Both magnets fell out within 3 months. I bought this as a gift for a scaffold worker in a refinery, they loved it until the magnets fell out. They need to find a better way to secure the magnets.
customer_reviews.author: JasonV

customer_reviews.title: Fine craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Fine craftsmanship with style. Wish they would go with the yellow liquid and bubble. Other than that, it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Highthereherb

customer_reviews.title: Well built level
customer_reviews.text: Really nice build quality. A little heavy, so I have to be mindful not to drop it on hardwood floors in clients homes. I wish the sight bubbles were in a yellow color instead of the blue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition
customer_reviews.text: Solid feel to it, definitely happy that I picked this up, even got a zippered pocket in my bag just for it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Calza

customer_reviews.title: I'm a builder - and this level is great!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a builder - and this level is great!!! Nice weight to it, accurate and looks so cool!!! Already had several trades try to run off with it...... it's nice
customer_reviews.author: Kevin  K Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Slick
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very slick versatile level. Slips into your back pocket like nothing. Only downside is the blue lines in blue vials are a little hard to see in low lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and strong magnets!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and strong magnets! The bubble can be a little hard to see in low light, which why 4 stars, but the level itself is great! Have had no issues with it and use it in an industrial environment.
customer_reviews.author: V.Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Accurate but very hard to read in dim areas
customer_reviews.text: Nice level but very tough to read when in a not well lit work area
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Quality is top notch built like a tank
customer_reviews.text: First class product nothing is taken for granted ...this is a buy once and have it for 40 yrs
customer_reviews.author: Mark A Hall

customer_reviews.title: Truly useful.
customer_reviews.text: Strong magnets. Quality level. Chips easily due to aluminum grade body.
customer_reviews.author: BrownBee88

customer_reviews.title: very nice product...
customer_reviews.text: The level is great. It has a nice hand feel, easy to read and the magnets actually secure to metal when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Black

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome protect, light and works well. The magnets are strong and the level doesn't fall off at all, unlike my previous one.
customer_reviews.author: Jayden

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I like how nice it looks. It makes me feel bad dropping it all overthe work site though. It works!
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Bradway

customer_reviews.title: Best buy I've made when it came to this type of level.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best levels I've ever owned in it's class. Solid and well worth the money it cost. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: Well made.strong magnets
customer_reviews.text: Much better than their plastic level. I would advise against getting that one. This is well made and a much stronger magnet
customer_reviews.author: bobby

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used it yet. The quality is superb! Empire makes good stuff, and AMAZON helps sell it. Thanks AMAZON.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nicest level I've ever put my hands on, bar none. Solid, big magnets, and easy to see. Magnets are good and strong. I bought this for work and now I want one at home. I only wish it had magnets on the V'd side also.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Bulky
customer_reviews.text: Nice level but it's very thick and heavy. Don't get me wrong I do like it just not what I imagined. Probably wouldn't buy another one. Magnets are only on one side and separate from one another. It's very well built and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Solid tool!
customer_reviews.text: I love these levels! I’m a union Pipefitter and have gone through many many levels over the years! Strong magnets and sturdy! Only level I’ll buy now!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Strong Magnets
customer_reviews.text: my third one, I need to stop dropping them down 50'+ of vertical pipe. the magnet is very strong
customer_reviews.author: Andrew R. Farley

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, Well Made!
customer_reviews.text: A little heavy for a pouch, but it is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgeT

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work good but magnet isn't as strong as thought to be.
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto ochoa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I like the durable feel of this , just wish the fluid was a bit more blue for contrast in bright light.
customer_reviews.author: Conor Ripley R

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very Easy to use. Most of all it is actually level! Viewing the bubbles on the end of the level is nice. And it looks cool. Nice, small level
customer_reviews.author: B&B

customer_reviews.title: Super durable and accurate level
customer_reviews.text: Durable, well built, super accurate, wish the antifreeze in the bubbles were green instead of clear though. Use it for all my fit ups and slap a cheaper level on it for QC buy off. Dead on everytime!
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Better then plastic
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I think price could come down a little. I will have to see how she holds up falling off a roof, only time will tell
customer_reviews.author: James Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Nice Level/Strong
customer_reviews.text: Nice design with strong magnets. I use it everyday doing HVAC installs. Dropped 12’ off a sissor lift and it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin S Chandler-Horowitz

customer_reviews.title: Best torpedo level out there
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best torpedo levels I've owned! It stayed true even after I dropped my first level from 50' in the air. Unfortunately I lost it and I had to by another.
customer_reviews.author: Mathom33

customer_reviews.title: If they made another one like this in a 12” I would definitely purchase it ...
customer_reviews.text: The aluminum body makes it ideal being a welder, everything I work on is 350 degrees minimum, so the aluminum helps not having to rush getting the level off the part before it melts. I am still weary of the glue stuff that’s holding the vials in. If they made another one like this in a 12” I would definitely purchase it also
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!! Real good level.
customer_reviews.text: Great level, I work at an industrial company, where I scaffold and the magnet on this level is really useful. Magnet is very strong and doesn't fall when placed on the material.
customer_reviews.author: Official Josh

customer_reviews.title: Minor issue but great pocket level
customer_reviews.text: This level has a nice machined look and feel. Within a week the grade tube slid out, luckily I noticed and slid it back in. Only downfall is the glue that secures the bubble tubes doesn’t hold and tubes move freely and come out. Good pocket level for the money
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb Shobe

customer_reviews.title: ... first month but added a sealer and made a great
customer_reviews.text: The bubble tubes started falling out the first month but added a sealer and made a great tool
customer_reviews.author: Jones

customer_reviews.title: It can take a beating.
customer_reviews.text: I'm always dropping my tools and I work construction. Mainly on/over concrete floors so things tend to break easier when I drop them but not this Empire its tough as they come.
customer_reviews.author: Dbs62616

customer_reviews.title: Feels like the kind of quality you used to be able ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is gorgeous! Solid aluminum body is perfectly machined and finished and generously thick, three fairly strong rare-earth magnets underneath. Feels like the kind of quality you used to be able to get back in the day. I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Eliot Michael

customer_reviews.title: Empire level for plumbing
customer_reviews.text: Worked great its very easy see at different angles on the first day. I would recommend and buy another one needed. Have yet to see how it holds up over time
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Pretty decent magnets for running conduit and seemed pretty accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Kainalu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really nice torpedo level. The magnet are quite good too
customer_reviews.author: Vanthony89

customer_reviews.title: perfect for a plumber
customer_reviews.text: way cheaper and have stronger magnet than similar products on Amazon, perfect for a plumber.
customer_reviews.author: yao zhong chen

customer_reviews.title: Does have the pipe level system that alot of others dont have
customer_reviews.text: Great strong magnet and if you are a pipe fitters or a structural fitter then this is a must to add on your tool box

customer_reviews.title: Nice level disappointed that is it is not USA made totally
customer_reviews.text: Very nice level too bad it was not totally USA made :(

customer_reviews.title: Well made heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: Well made heavy duty. Magnets are super strong holds well to metals. I would buy again. I know a few people in the trades that bought these and they love them.

customer_reviews.title: boom!
customer_reviews.text: it totally works, i was able to put it on the ground and prove the earth is flat #flatearther

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction. All in all a great tool for your tool box. This is my second because someone like the first one more than I did.

customer_reviews.title: Great torpedo level
customer_reviews.text: My go to level. Fits in my tool belt, always the first thing I grab, every bit as accurate as my empire blu 48"

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the cheap ones out there that are made from China!

customer_reviews.text: Great level for plumbing! It is super heavy duty and the magnets are strong. Love that level.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for construction
customer_reviews.text: Works great for construction, magnets are strong esp for sprinkler or electric work. Plumbing I’d recommend a torpedo or grade level!! Works great ether way!!

customer_reviews.text: Great level, doesn't fall off metal studs when installing headers and fastening screws.

customer_reviews.text: Overall very satisfied with the product I kind of wish the magnets were a touch stronger though

customer_reviews.title: Haven't had this very long and one of the magnets ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had this very long and one of the magnets have already fell off. Kinda hard to keep it on conduit with only 2 magnets
customer_reviews.author: Bryan K.

customer_reviews.title: Tried cheaper versions... happy with this one.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy, solid and true. Can't ask for much more. Magnets are strong.

customer_reviews.text: This level works in the clay of Boston , you could say it’s on the level

customer_reviews.title: Must have this little guy
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome well built little level it has a nice weight to it as well I love it

customer_reviews.title: Details say the country of origin is USA. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Details say the country of origin is USA. I got mine and the package is marked made in Taiwan. Is hard enough buying American without being lied to.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Dotson

customer_reviews.title: Seems great; but two failures is two too many.
customer_reviews.text: Level looks and feels great. Solid, easy to read, small enough to fit in my nail bags. But the epoxy failed within a month allowing the level vial to wiggle around. Contacted Amazon and they sent a free replacement; which arrived with a wiggly level vial. Not fair to keep asking amazon for free ones. Gonna have to buy a higher quality level.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Peterson

customer_reviews.title: I bought one and I love it
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal level. The weight is just perfect. Feels great in the hand. It's heavy so if your replacing your plastic level like I was get ready for a little extra weight in the tool bag. Built solid.
customer_reviews.author: tivolife

customer_reviews.title: Great for small jobs
customer_reviews.text: Works well for small projects. Not accurate enough for big jobs like in ground main drain pipe. Leave that project for laser level.

customer_reviews.title: needs more/better magnets
customer_reviews.text: It's a little heavier then other metal ones from other companies, plus the 3 magnets underneath are fairly weak.

customer_reviews.title: Solid tool
customer_reviews.text: Well built feels real solid. only down side is that its made of aluminum so if you drop it it we'll get tiny dents on it. But overall great

customer_reviews.text: One of the vials came loose the first day but I did drop it about 10 feet onto concrete. Other than that worked great

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is very accurate and fits in small spaces and has strong magnets to hold onto metal.

product_meta.title: EMPIRE EM71.8 Professional True Blue Magnetic Box Level, 8"
feature_bullets: Blue-banded vials highlight Bubble edges and improve readability
True blue solid block acrylic vials resist breaking, leaking and fogging - 400% stronger than standard vials
300-Degree view true blue vials with top-reading window for easy readings
Patented true blue vials are accurate to within .0005 in per inch in all working positions
Heavy-duty 6061 T5 aircraft aluminum chassis provides durability

specifications.Included Components: Empire EM71.8 Professional True Blue Magnetic Box Level, 8"
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars491 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
